StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetContract]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@ContractID int AS
DECLARE @LanguageRecordPresent bit
--- RETRIEVE THE LANGUAGE RECORD PRESENT FLAG SET @LanguageRecordPresent = CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM CONTRACT C INNER JOIN NWA N ON C.CONTRACT_ID = @ContractID AND C.NWA_ID = N.NWA_ID INNER JOIN CANDIDATE_LANGUAGE CL ON CL.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR(11), C.CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE,106) CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE, CC.COMPONENT_DESCRIPTION, C.TERM_OF_ENLISTMENT, CONVERT(VARCHAR(11), C.ENTNAC_SUBMIT_DATE,106) ENTNAC_SUBMIT_DATE, CONVERT(VARCHAR(11), C.ENTNAC_COMPLETE_DATE,106) ENTNAC_COMPLETE_DATE, CONVERT(VARCHAR(11), C.PROJECTED_SHIP_DATE,106) PROJECTED_SHIP_DATE, C.DEP_EXTENSION, C.PROJECTED_TRAINING_ORG_ID, COALESCE(N.SOURCE_CODE, SPACE(0)) SOURCE_CODE, COALESCE(N.SOURCE_CODE_DUAL, SPACE(0)) SOURCE_CODE_DUAL, N.ACTIVITY_CODE, N.PPC, COALESCE(C.YOUTH_PROGRAM_CODE, SPACE(0)) YOUTH_PROGRAM_CODE, C.CATEGORY_P, C.SPECIAL_INTEREST, C.DISCHARGE_CODE, CONVERT(VARCHAR(11), C.DISCHARGE_DATE,106) DISCHARGE_DATE, C.IST_DATE, C.IST_MINUTES, C.IST_SECONDS, C.IST_PULL_UPS, C.IST_HANG, C.IST_CRUNCHES, C.IST_RESULT, C.COMPONENT_CODE, C.USER_LOGIN, COALESCE(RS.SOURCE_DESCRIPTION, SPACE(0)) AS SOURCE_DESCRIPTION, COALESCE(RS.TYPE, SPACE(0)) AS SOURCE_TYPE, COALESCE(RS.ACTIVE, SPACE(0)) AS SOURCE_ACTIVE, COALESCE(RS_DUAL.SOURCE_DESCRIPTION, SPACE(0)) AS SOURCE_DUAL_DESCRIPTION, N.EMAIL_ADDRESS, @LanguageRecordPresent AS LANGUAGE_RECORD_PRESENT, COALESCE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(3), C.DAYS_ALLOWED_IN_DEP), SPACE(0)) AS DAYS_ALLOWED_IN_DEP, CASE DAYS_ALLOWED_IN_DEP WHEN 410 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS ENLIST_410_PROGRAM_INDICATOR, dbo.GetEduca.onLevelCodeAtContract (N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID, C.CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE) AS EDUCATION_LEVEL_CODE FROM CONTRACT C INNER JOIN NWA N ON C.NWA_ID = N.NWA_ID INNER JOIN COMPONENT_CODE CC ON C.COMPONENT_CODE = CC.COMPONENT_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN RECRUITING_SOURCE RS ON N.SOURCE_CODE = RS.SOURCE_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN RECRUITING_SOURCE RS_DUAL ON N.SOURCE_CODE_DUAL = RS_DUAL.SOURCE_CODE WHERE C.CONTRACT_ID = @ContractID
